item.title: How To Install Ubuntu in a Samsung 900x3a ultraportable laptop
item.description: I’ve been running Ubuntu 11.4 Natty Narwhal for a few days already on a brand new Samsung 900x3a and I have to say that I’m quite happy with it. First of all, Ubuntu Linux is the best operating system in this galaxy. Then, the machine is great, and not only for the looks. Here’s a simplified How-To: Download Ubuntu, make sure that in the dropdown box you choose the 64bit version.

item.title: Dropbox tips
item.description: If you’re like us, you’re using Dropbox for all kinds of unusual tasks. But we wanted to go further, so we asked the experts at Dropbox to tell us their most unusual, unexpected and crazy ways to use this versatile software tool. If you’re not familiar with Dropbox, it’s free desktop synchronization software that lets you store a copy of a file on your computer and then access that same file from anywhere.

item.title: Facebook in 2010 – The Top 30 Most Useful Blog Posts on Facebook
7 tricks for your corporate twitter – Turbomilk
Howto watch, hear and use all those things you can’t because of being abroad
item.description: It sucks to be cut out to your culture because of your location. Internet, knowledge, arts, culture are universal and should be ubiquitous.
